channel.title: Kentik - Hands On Lab :: Kentik Partner Workshop
channel.description: A workshop towards getting the HOL Kentik picture

item.title: Pre-Workshop Tasks
item.description: Prior to this workshop, you should have received an email with instructions on how to set up a free trial Kentik account. This is a prerequisite step in order to be able to run the Labs during the workshop. If you already have registered for an account you can follow the tasks for validation. Task 0.1 - Register for a Free Trial Account Navigate to kentik.com/get-started and fill in your details in the form to create your free trial Kentik account.

item.title: Topology
item.description: This section will familiarize you with the network topology that we are going to be using throughout this workshop. While go through the topology, please, access the LAB link and start LAB.1 that will take about 5 minutes to load and set things up for us.

item.title: Lab.1 - Onboarding
item.description: Theory and LAB description Task 1.1 - Device DiscoveryDeploy Universal Agent and Onboard Devices via Kentik NMS Task 1.2 - Portal ConfigurationConfigure relevant Kentik Resources to support our use case Task 1.3 - Enabling FlowPerform required steps to ingest netflow from devices Task 1.4 - Portal VerificationVerify visibility in the portal

item.title: Lab.2 - Alerting
item.description: Theory and LAB description Task 2.1 - NMS AlertingShort Description Task 2.2 - Traffic AlertingShort Description Task 2.3 - DDoS AlertingShort Description Task 2.4 - TitleShort Description

item.title: Lab.3 - Synthetics
item.description: Theory and LAB description Task 3.1 - Deploy AgentsShort Description Task 3.2 - Agent-to-Agent TestsShort Description Task 3.3 - TitleShort Description Task 3.4 - TitleShort Description

item.title: Lab.4 - Custom Metrics
item.description: Theory and LAB description Task 4.1 - TitleShort Description Task 4.2 - TitleShort Description Task 4.3 - TitleShort Description Task 4.4 - TitleShort Description
